parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the local document text format, false to use the text format specified by TextFormat

parameters.name: TextFormat
parameters.description: Text format to use if UseDoc is false

title: IDetailCircle.SetTextFormat
description: Sets the text format for this detail circle.
signature:
System.Boolean SetTextFormat( 
   System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   TextFormat
TextFormat
)

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the local document text format, false to use the text format specified by TextFormat

parameters.name: TextFormat
parameters.description: Text format to use if UseDoc is false

returns: True if the format was set successfully, false if it was not
